data.event: The area of Columbus was first settled around 1791.
The town was formed in 1805 from the town of Brookfield (now in Madison County).

event.title: was obtained from the town of Norwich in 1807

data.event: Additional territory was obtained from the town of Norwich in 1807.

event.title: was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1986

data.event: The Columbus Community Church was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1986.
